AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_hashedpasswords
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: All accounts must have a hashed password.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_checkuid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Ensure all users have a unique UID and name on the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_checkgid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Ensure all groups have a unique GID and name on the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_cde_lock
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must automatically lock after 15 minutes of inactivity in the CDE Graphical desktop environment.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_tmout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must terminate all login sessions after 10 mins if inactivity.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_jfs2_efs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must encrypt user data at rest using AIX Encrypted File System (EFS) if it is required.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_installed
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information during preparation for transmission and maintain the confidentiality and integrity of information during reception and disable all non-encryption network access methods.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_chownaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Set the ownership root:audit for /audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_chpermaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Set the permissions u=rwx,g=rx,o= for /audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_chpermauditdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Set the permissions u=rw,g=r,o= for all /audit/* objects and the children objects recursively.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_chownsecurityaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Set the ownership root:audit for all /etc/security/audit directory tree objects.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_chpermsecurityaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Set the permissions u=rwx,g=rx,o= for/etc/security/audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_chpermsecurityauditdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Set the permissions u=rw,g=r,o= for all /etc/security/audit/* objects and the children objects recursively.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_justified_remote_syslog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must only use remote syslog servers justified and documented using site-defined procedures.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_no_remote_syslog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Syslog should not accept remote syslog messages.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_rbac
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must provide RBAC roles to perform auditing on all operating system components.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit_space_allocation
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must allocate audit record storage capacity to store at least one weeks worth of audit records, when audit records are not immediately sent to a central audit record storage facility.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditbinperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX audit tools must be set to 4550 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit_tool_hash
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must verify the hash of audit tools.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit_log_rotate
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX audit logs must be rotated daily.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit_report_gen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must provide a report generation function that supports on-demand audit review and analysis, on-demand reporting requirements, and after-the-fact investigations of security incidents.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit_timezone
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must record time stamps for audit records that can be mapped to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditconf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX audit files must be set to 640 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditcatgrp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be group owned by audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditconv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_tcpd_logging
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: TCPD mail logging should be configured in syslog.conf.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit_process_id
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must produce audit records containing information to establish the source and the identity of any individual or process associated with an event.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit_status
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must produce audit records containing information to establish the outcome of the events.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditbingrp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be group owned by audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditcat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditcatgrp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be group owned by audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditconv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditconvgrp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be group owned by audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit conf files on AIX must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditgrp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit conf files on AIX must be group owned by audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditmerge
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditmergegrp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be group owned by audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditpr
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditprgrp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be group owned by audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditselectgrp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be group owned by audit and owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditstream
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditstreamgrp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be group owned by audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditldap
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditldapgrp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be group owned by audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit log files must be set to 660 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditstart
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must start Audit at boot.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit_freespace
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must be configured to generate an audit record when 75% of the audit file system is full.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit_recording
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must produce audit records containing the full-text recording of privileged commands.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audittrail
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Audit logs on AIX must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditselect
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must provide auditselect command.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit_event_locations
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must produce audit records containing information to establish where the events occurred.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit_events
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must provide audit record generation functionality for DoD-defined auditable events.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_auditspace
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must produce audit records containing information for the events occured.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_ntppperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX time synchronization configuration file must have mode 0640 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_wtmplink
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must monitor and record successful remote logins.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshdpermitrootlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must not permit root login using remote access program ssh.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_failedloginlink
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must monitor and record unsuccessful remote logins.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_audit_disk_full_action
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: AIX must be configured so that the audit system takes appropriate action when the audit storage volume is full.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_secureNFS
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: NFS - secure NFS.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshversionv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Minimum version is 8.1.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_rmetchostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Disable or comment out entries from /etc/hosts.equiv file.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_shosts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Remove any existing .shosts files from all user home directories.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_permitrootlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: PermitRootLogin is prohibit-password or no.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_banner
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Banner exists and message contains Only authorized users allowed.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_hostbasedauthentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: HostbasedAuthentication is no.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_ignore_rhosts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: IgnoreRhosts is yes or shosts-only.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_permit_empty_passwords
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: PermitEmptyPasswords is no.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_log_level
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: LogLevel is INFO or VERBOSE.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_sftp_server_args
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: sftp-server arguments include -u 027 -f AUTH -l INFO.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertArgs: MULTIPLE Subsystem "sftp /usr/sbin/sftp-server -u 027 -f AUTH -l VERBOSE" "sftp /usr/sbin/sftp-server -u 027 -f AUTH -l DEBUG" /etc/ssh/sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_max_auth_tries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: MaxAuthTries is 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_permit_user_environment
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: PermitUserEnvironment is no.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_kex_algorithms
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: KexAlgorithms.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_ciphers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: Ciphers.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_macs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: MACs - Message Authtification Codes.

AIXPertEntry.name: hipaav1_sshd_rekey_limit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements HIPAAv1 recommendations for AIX: ReKeyLimit.
